name: Calibre-Web Automated
short_desc: Making Calibre-Web your dream, all-in-one self-hosted digital library solution.
author: crocodilestick
description: Calibre-Web Automated aims to be an all-in-one solution, combining the modern lightweight web UI from Calibre-Web with the robust, versatile feature set of Calibre, with a slew of extra features and automations thrown in on top.
